## ==üí° THOUGHT==

### ==Yes, you are qualified to teach your kids==

[https://platform.twitter.com/embed/Tweet.html?dnt=true&embedId=twitter-widget-0&%3D%3D&frame=false&hideCard=false&hideThread=false&id=1851609156702158964&lang=en&origin=https%3A%2F%2Fopened.co%2Fdaily%2Fyes-youre-qualified-to-teach-your-kids%2F&sessionId=6aad476184cbd75de83b4ede9e18845b132af4af&theme=light&widgetsVersion=2615f7e52b7e0%3A1702314776716&width=500px](https://platform.twitter.com/embed/Tweet.html?dnt=true&embedId=twitter-widget-0&%3D%3D&frame=false&hideCard=false&hideThread=false&id=1851609156702158964&lang=en&origin=https%3A%2F%2Fopened.co%2Fdaily%2Fyes-youre-qualified-to-teach-your-kids%2F&sessionId=6aad476184cbd75de83b4ede9e18845b132af4af&theme=light&widgetsVersion=2615f7e52b7e0%3A1702314776716&width=500px)

==Homeschooling dad M.A. Franklin has a good reminder not to let anyone make you feel inadequate about your ability to teach your children.==

==His insight touches on something we see often at OpenEd: Parents doubting their ability to guide their children‚Äôs education, despite having unique insights into how their kids learn best.==

==Here‚Äôs what we know from thousands of families:==

- ==The most important qualification is caring deeply about your child‚Äôs development==
- ==Enthusiasm for learning is contagious==
- ==You don‚Äôt need to know everything ‚Äì you just need to know how to find resources==

==The question isn‚Äôt whether you‚Äôre qualified. It‚Äôs about finding the right mix of tools and approaches that work for your family.==

[==Read the full post at Foundation Father==](https://www.foundationfather.com/p/you-can-teach-them?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=070-yes-you-re-qualified-to-teach-your-kids)

## ==üìä TREND==

### ==Career-Connected Learning (the numbers don‚Äôt lie)==

[==A program in Guilford County, NC is showing==](https://www.the74million.org/article/connecting-learning-and-careers-to-build-the-workforce-of-tomorrow/?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=070-yes-you-re-qualified-to-teach-your-kids)¬†==what‚Äôs possible when we break down walls between education and real-world experience. Their ‚ÄúSignature Career Academies‚Äù let students earn industry credentials while still in high school. The results:==

- ==2020-21: 2,966 credentials earned==
- ==2021-22: 7,118 credentials earned==
- ==2022-23: 10,766 credentials earned==

==At the same time, the district‚Äôs graduation rate hit 92.2% ‚Äì an all-time high.==

==Why? Because when learning feels relevant, students show up. When students see the direct connection between their education and their future, they engage.==

[==Read the full article at the 74 Million==](https://www.the74million.org/article/connecting-learning-and-careers-to-build-the-workforce-of-tomorrow/?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=070-yes-you-re-qualified-to-teach-your-kids)

## ==‚öíÔ∏è TOOL==

### [==**Code.org**==](https://code.org/?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=070-yes-you-re-qualified-to-teach-your-kids)==: Where Computer Science Meets Real Learning==

==Looking to add some tech skills to your educational mix?==¬†[==Code.org==](https://code.org/?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=070-yes-you-re-qualified-to-teach-your-kids)¬†==is a complete computer science education platform used by over 80 million students worldwide.==

- ==Zero cost, forever==
- ==Available in 67+ languages (that‚Äôs spoken languages, not programming languages)==
- ==Self-paced courses for every skill level==

==That last point means you can start exactly where you are. Whether your child is a tech wizard or has never written a line of code,==¬†[==Code.org==](https://code.org/?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=070-yes-you-re-qualified-to-teach-your-kids)¬†==meets them at their level.==

==Ready to explore? Start with==¬†[==the Hour of Code==](https://code.org/hourofcode?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=070-yes-you-re-qualified-to-teach-your-kids)¬†==(perfect for ages 4 through 104!).==

[==Visit¬†Code.org¬†to get started==](https://code.org/?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=070-yes-you-re-qualified-to-teach-your-kids)
